title: Performance Optimization
body_html:
Performance Optimization

DB

  • Ensure indices on hot paths (status, nextRetry, webhookConfig)
  • Projection to avoid large payloads when listing

Async

  • Use queue workers; cap concurrency
  • Batch pending events processing

Backoff & Circuit Breaker

  • Exponential backoff to protect targets
  • Trip circuit on repeated failures; cool-down window
